title: Dodged a Ranked Game Because Client Gave Me a Black Screen During Champion Select
body:
So I just dodged a ranked game during a promotional series because my client gave me a black screen during my promotional series as soon as I entered champion select. My assumption is that I was banning because I heard the sound effect for it but I couldn't do anything because, again, I had a black screen. Is there any way to remove, what I assume will count as an automatic loss from my account?

Edit: I just tried playing my third ranked game in my promo series, and of course, everyone on my team fed and I lost my series. Plus, I highly doubt anyone from the Support Team will even have the  decency to reply to this thread and help make amends for the client bugs that are causing so much recent frustration among the player-base. Fucking massive waste of time.

replies.body: Yep same thing happened to me.

Same. I was 1/1 in my promos to gold and the client started giving me black screens, forced queue dodge and I was removed from my qualifications. I really hope riot does something about it as I worked hard to get there <.<
I've had the same problem, in addition to having to not be able to pick my champion all select phase because the menu won't appear - because that makes sense.

We've gotten a few reports of this black screen, and it really sucks it happened during your promos.  :(  We've received a good amount of logs from players and investigating the issue, but in the meantime a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) has successfully served as a workaround.  Be sure to go over a custom match first just to be sure.  While we can't adjust game stats, I hope that can help.  Let me know if you have any questions.
i even get this in AR URF... xD
